points: Leading interactive industry training in comuter programming and data science, including month-long graduate schemes for banks in the global top 10.
Teaching data cleaning, visualisation, big data and machine learning using Python packages such as Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib, Plotly, Scikit-learn, Tensorflow and PySpark.
Coaching data analysts in advanced SQL, NoSQL and Tableau.
Teaching front end development with JavaScript, HTML and CSS.
Teaching developer skills such as Linux/UNIX command line and Git.
Collaborating with stakeholders to create bespoke technical courses , tailored to the client firm's training needs.
Teaching courses online, in person, and hybrid, harnessing EdTech.
Directing and coaching teaching assistants and course facilitators.
